description:
Snapshots extesions does not have API samples testing.

Please take a look at the blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get instructions on how to write the tests.

Also refer to bug 1071338
title: Snapshots does not have API samples testing
